resources.string: The registration operation needs to be completed in order to finish the login process.
Check if the time on your device is correct, and try again. For your safety, the SAPO authentication system only allows a 5 minutes window error frame on the device.
You must accept the authorization request in order to complete the authentication process.
No network connection available. Please, provide a valid Wi-Fi or Mobile connection and try again.
No network connection available. Please, provide a valid Wi-Fi or Mobile connection and try again.
Server is not available. Please try again later.
There was an error while validating your identity on the server. Please, try again.
There was an error while validating your identity on the server. If the error persists, please logout and login again.
